name: Constructing and Deconstructing the Meshina Veil
description:
The Meshina Veil is an orphan technology - a phenomenon without a "raison d'être"... We can build it... We can "unbuild" it... But we have no purposeful or tangible use for it. It is believed by many, however, that it will one day prove to be the sole mechanism by which we are able to survive and endure.
|| video loop; 07:24; *.m4v; 500x500px ||
